Function reference

Delayed Dataset Constructors

For creating delayed dataset objects.

cdisc_dataset()
Create a new object of CDISCTealDataset class
cdisc_dataset_file()
Load CDISCTealDataset object from a file
dataset()
S3 method to construct an MAETealDataset object from MultiAssayExperiment
dataset_file()
Load TealDataset object from a file
mae_dataset()
The constructor of MAETealDataset

Delayed Dataset Connectors Constructors

For creating delayed dataset connector objects.

cdisc_data_connector()
The constructor of CDISCTealDataConnector objects.
cdisc_dataset_connector()
Create a new CDISCTealDatasetConnector object
dataset_connector_file() cdisc_dataset_connector_file()
Load TealDatasetConnector object from a file
code_dataset_connector() code_cdisc_dataset_connector()
Code TealDatasetConnector
csv_dataset_connector() csv_cdisc_dataset_connector()
csv TealDatasetConnector
data_connection()
The constructor for TealDataConnection class.
dataset_connector()
Create a new TealDatasetConnector object
fun_dataset_connector() fun_cdisc_dataset_connector()
Function Dataset Connector
python_dataset_connector() python_cdisc_dataset_connector()
Python TealDatasetConnector
rds_dataset_connector() rds_cdisc_dataset_connector()
RDS TealDatasetConnector
relational_data_connector()
The constructor for TealDataConnector class.
scda_dataset_connector() scda_cdisc_dataset_connector()
scda TealDatasetConnector
script_dataset_connector() script_cdisc_dataset_connector()
Script TealDatasetConnector

Delayed Data Constructors

For creating delayed data objects.

cdisc_data()
Data input for teal app
cdisc_data_file()
Load TealData object from a file
teal_data()
Teal data
teal_data_file()
Load TealData object from a file
to_relational_data()
S3 generic for to_relational_data function.

Delayed Dataset Functions

For loading and modifying delayed data objects.

as_cdisc()
Convert a TealDataset(Connector) object to a CDISCTealDataset(Connector) object
callable_code()
Create CallableCode object
callable_function()
Create CallableFunction object
get_attrs()
Get dataset attributes
get_cdisc_keys()
Function that returns the default keys for a CDISC dataset by name
get_code()
Get code
get_dataname()
S3 method for getting a dataname(s) of (TealDataAbstract, (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object
get_dataset()
Get dataset from TealDatasetConnector
get_dataset_label()
S3 method for getting a label of (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object
get_datasets()
Get a TealDataset objects.
get_keys()
Get dataset primary keys
get_raw_data()
Retrieve raw data
is_pulled()
Is pulled
load_dataset()
Load data from connection
load_datasets()
Load datasets
mutate_data()
Mutate data by code
mutate_dataset()
Mutate dataset by code
mutate_join_keys()
Mutate JoinKeys with a new values
set_args()
Set arguments of a CallableFunction
set_keys()
Set dataset primary keys

Helpers

Other useful functions for users and developers.

data_label()
Get dataset label attribute
`data_label<-`()
Set dataset label attribute
get_key_duplicates()
S3 generic for creating an information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset
get_labels()
Extracts dataset and variable labels from a dataset.
join_key()
Create a relationship between a pair of datasets
join_keys()
Create a JoinKeys out of a list of JoinKeySet objects
python_code()
Python Code
read_script()
Read .R file into character
validate_metadata()
validate metadata as a list of length one atomic entries (or NULL)

For Developers

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

R6 Classes

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

CallableCode
A CallableCode class of objects
CallablePythonCode
A CallablePythonCode class of objects
CDISCTealDataConnector
Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.
CDISCTealDataset
R6 Class representing a dataset with parent attribute
CDISCTealDatasetConnector
A CDISCTealDatasetConnector class of objects
JoinKeys
R6 Class to store relationships for joining datasets
MAETealDataset
R6 Class representing a MultiAssayExperiment object with its attributes
PythonCodeClass
A CallablePythonCode class of objects
TealData
Manage multiple TealDataConnector, TealDatasetConnector and TealDataset objects.
TealDataConnection
A TealDataConnection class of objects
TealDataConnector
Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.
TealDataset
R6 Class representing a dataset with its attributes
TealDatasetConnector
A TealDatasetConnector class of objects
